settings.code:
Join Boho Magic's Ambassador Program

For over 15 years, we’ve embarked on a passionate journey, crafting and curating exquisite jewelry that resonates with the free spirit in each of us. At the heart of our mission is the desire to inspire women to unconditionally love themselves and dare to express their authentic selves, and we'd love for you to join our world of Bohemian beauty!

Who is it for?

We’re calling for all the free-spirited, authentic voices who aim to uplift and inspire their communities to live authentically and embrace their inner Bohemian spirit.

What’s in it for you

  • Up to 20% commissions
  • Exclusive discounts for your community
  • Receive beautifully crafted, artisan jewelry pieces that reflect your unique style and spirit.
  • Dedicated help and support from our team.

1. Apply for the program

Sign up via the link below and gain access to our affiliate dashboard, which features your personal tracking link, discount code, and advertising materials.

2. Tell your audience about Boho Magic

We encourage you to express yourself! Wear our pieces your way, in your own voice, and let your creativity shine.

3. Earn commissions

You get a commission every time your custom link drives sales for Boho Magic. You will receive your payouts via PayPal once per month.

settings.text: To become an ambassador, please click here to fill out the form, and we will contact you within 3 working days!

settings.title: What are the Terms and Conditions of the ambassador program?
settings.text:
Please familiarise yourself with the Terms and Conditions of the Boho Magic Ambassadors program before signing up. It's important to read the documents in full because both describe the principles of the program.

If you have any questions regarding terms and conditions, please reach out to ambassadors@boho-magic.com

settings.title: How do I get my unique ambassador link?
settings.text: We will email you your personal ambassador link and all the necessary information once you are accepted to the program. Additionally, you can find your personal ambassador link on your Partner Dashboard.

settings.title: How and when will I get paid?
settings.text: You earn a commission when someone who has used your ambassador link becomes our customer. Payouts are made at the beginning of each month for accounts with a balance of at least $50.

settings.title: Will I receive free products?
settings.text: Yes, after you are accepted to our ambassador program, we will send you a gift!

settings.title: What can we do for my audience? Do you provide a discount or can we do giveaways?
settings.text: You get a discount code for your audience, and giveaways are possible if you have a creative and engaging idea!

settings.title: Can I run ads to promote my link?
settings.text: Meta Ads aren’t allowed. Google Ads are allowed but require preapproval from our team. If you’d like to run ads, please contact us first at ambassadors@boho-magic.com.
To become an ambassador, please click here to fill out the form. We will contact you within 3 working days!

settings.code: If you have any questions or ideas about the ambassador program, please email us at ambassadors@boho-magic.com, and we will respond within a few days!
